name: Break my body
description:
A medical breakout game where you must NOT break all tiles!


Help professor Brick treat a hopeless patient. Break his cancer tumors, one by one and cell by cell. Destroying all sick cells while avoiding healthy ones is a real challenge.

Buckle up, SCIENCE needs you!

Have fun with tons of creative levels, toy with physics: each treatment zone widens your possibilities with a new type of cell introduced.
Grab bonus drops but avoid malus ones.
Special antibiotics drops are needed to replenish your syringe and protect healthy cells.

Get ready for a deep challenge and discover 10 unique zones to unlock a total of 100 levels!
